website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality eating space that adapts perfectly to condo and apartment life.
pros: Heavy in a good way that customers associate with durability and strength of build
Attractive wood set instantly upgrades where you eat your pancakes
cons: May take up to 3 hours to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Certainly one of the most time consuming things I've ever took putting it together, probably from trial and error, but very nice quality for the price. The holes aren't the most aligned, so only put together the table portion just lightly screwing in the screws until they're all in before actually securing and tightening them. Tape the key underneath for tightening after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Pace

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Sturdy.  Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what we wanted. It looks exactly like the photo. The materials are sturdy and of good quality. It definitely does not look like a $200 table and chairs. We put some felt on the bottom of the chairs to keep it from scratching the floor. We are very pleased with it, and I'm rather picky, so that is quite a compliment. We are very happy with this purchase and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice table took about 3 hrs to build
customer_reviews.text: Nice table took about 3 hrs to build, need pad for the chairs but it a nice set for the money and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Girone

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great table...love the look and feel. Sturdy. Assembly strait forward...took about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic table with horrible assembly process
customer_reviews.text: When finally put together the table will work for very basic needs; however, the assembly is ludicrous. It takes way too long and is a waste of your time. I am pretty good working with tools and it is not difficult to follow the directions but there a so many bolts and it makes the process atrociously tedious. The product is metal and cheap laminate and every time you tighten one set of screws, the others misaligned turning a basic task into one akin to herding cats. I felt like Sisyphus. The manufacturer needs to redesign this aspect of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Velinda Kate Kish

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this table!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table! I just bought a bunch of new furniture and this is my favorite thing. I was really surprised with the quality of the wood and the metal. My last table that was a Brand you can buy at Walmart was not very good quality. This table looks really nice! The chairs are the perfect height to fit at my counter as well and look great. The assembly was not too bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Chichi style
customer_reviews.text: We have and will continue to have fun around this table
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great seller customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice counter height dinette set. Great for small apartment size kitchen. Price is great...nice quality. Seller is wonderful to work with...had a damaged wood seat and noticed after set was assembled...seller had to order from manufacturer and stated it would take 90 days to receive which I agreed to. Without any follow up on my part the new seat was delivered in 90 days. Excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: J. Little

customer_reviews.title: Great condition, love the height and design
customer_reviews.text: Delivered a day earlier than the estimated time frame. Great condition, love the height and design!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could have been a great table,  but...
customer_reviews.text: I would give it zero stars, if I could. I received my table a lot sooner than expected, which was nice. There are two corners on the table top that were dented/slightly crushed, as other reviewers have said. I was ok with that, considering it was a fairly affordable table, and the corners on mine weren't nearly as bad as others'. However, all four of the wood seat parts (the part your butt sits on) of the chairs were broken in half. And I mean broken all the way through, snapped in half. Overall, I can't recommend this product. I am waiting to hear back from the seller about getting new seat parts, but I am not holding my breath.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy well made set.
customer_reviews.text: This table and chairs are beautiful. Solid with metal construction. Some people will need to muster up extra patience. We had our box "dropped" by FedEx causing some of the metal to slightly bend. However my fiance did an unbelievable job of putting it all together. I read other reviews before we purchased this and am very glad we did. I will be putting on a piece of plexiglass to protect the table top but otherwise this set will be maintenance free.
customer_reviews.author: DMW

customer_reviews.title: Assembly a challenge - but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table and chairs for our son's first apartment. We had read the reviews related to challenging assembly and that is true--for us it was the chairs that were difficult. But, the time and effort is worth it for this set. It is attractive and sturdy--perfect for a smaller space and durable enough to withstand use by former college football players.
customer_reviews.author: KBD

customer_reviews.title: nice set for the money
customer_reviews.text: One of the seats is split but luckily is barely noticable and too much of a hassle to return. Otherwise, nice set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Cirillo

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously Hard To Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend simply because of how hard it is to put this set together. I wouldn’t wish assembly of this set on my worst enemy. I am unbelievably frustrated from the amount of time and effort it has taken to assemble this. Cute table suitable for a small dining area but it is just absolutely ridiculous to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Check for all the pieces before assembly
customer_reviews.text: I like the table but after I finished putting it together One of the little chair pieces that makes contact with the floor was missing and when I called them they told me to dismantle and send the whole thing back or they could credit me $5 . So I have been trying to search for the piece online but no luck
customer_reviews.author: Scott Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality of this table and chairs due to the affordable price, but we have been using it several weeks and so far, so good. Seems really sturdy, looks great, and was not that bad to put together.
customer_reviews.author: KeriSue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for a table and chairs for less than ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for a table and chairs for less than $250. Highly recommend. You will need some time assemble. Lots of screws, more than 140.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great! a little work 2 put 2 gather but ...
customer_reviews.text: great! a little work 2 put 2 gather but worth it
customer_reviews.author: John Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great dinette set.
customer_reviews.text: Love the table and chairs. Need lots of time to put together but it will worth it. Just be patient. Nice and heavy. Table have a small scratch but it’s not very noticeable. Will be great for the eat in kitchen. Also great for game nights.
customer_reviews.author: M.M

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The wood is beautiful and I love how it compliments my wood floor. Pretty sturdy. Assembly was easy. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Good table, minus shipping damages
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived in a box that was possibly roughed up a bit. One corner of the table had some damage (slightly chewed up), and one chair backing support had a crack down the middle. Overall, the table wasn't too hard to put together. The chair assembly is quite the process and requires a bit of wiggling to get the slots to line up.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Alicki

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy item in the box....time consuming but manageable to assemble by one person. Very sturdy as well. I would suggest felt pads for the legs if placing on a wood floor, for protection and easy movement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ease of assembly is multiplied by owning a drill and bit set.
customer_reviews.text: After spending several days shopping for a sturdy, great looking and affordable countertop set, I took the chance for the money and decided on this set. It is everything the flyer says and more. I assure you can't find a better set.
customer_reviews.author: Darrick

customer_reviews.title: Quality and simple to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to build and it seems like it's good quality
customer_reviews.author: michael magerkurth

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the product
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the product. My husband and son-in-law got to put it together for me. That's the only challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Looks really great in her kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This set was purchased for my sister. Looks really great in her kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: mysty

customer_reviews.title: Allow several hours for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Took me 5 hours to assemble and I’m an ikea queen. But it was worth it. It’s sturdy and looks like it cost more than I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s very sturdy and well put together very much worth the money . Keep in mind that it’s heavy so delivery must’ve been rough . Item was delivered with a few scratches because box was damaged upon delivery. Other than that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Lalasodope

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked that a set so affordable would actually be durable and great looking. Assembly was super easy- I’m beyond thrilled with my purchase and we get compliments on it all the time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The furniture looked great, however
customer_reviews.text: The furniture looked great, however, there were several damaged areas on the table, and one of the chairs. It was purchased as a gift, and my daughter chose to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Randa D.

customer_reviews.title: You have to make your own holes for the screws under the seat of the chair.
customer_reviews.text: The directions were easy to follow, and the product was not difficult to assemble. It was time consuming, but not difficult. I will say that the chairs were a little confusing and I had to start over on them, but it was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Alexx_00

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: Love the set! Heavy duty, but an hour to put together with drill. Only 4 stars because arrived with small dent from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality product easy to assemble. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a budget hightop dining table.
customer_reviews.author: Izaar Thorne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this table and stools
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this table and stools! Instructions were precise and didn't take too long to put together. Great color, style, and comfy (especially for not having cushions!)
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Teel

customer_reviews.title: this table is very sturdy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Although the assembly is time consuming, this table is very sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and sturdy. A little damage on one corner, but, is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy.
customer_reviews.text: I love my new table and chairs. It was fairly easy to put together and is made of very sturdy and durable material. It looks so good in my kitchen and I just started the remodel. I can’t wait to get it done and all together.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great priduct
customer_reviews.text: Chair a little bit work to put them together but ,it an item that has to be assembled. Great for the price, I love Products made by better homes and gardens.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this spill I good for the price very stabled the great dining Room Piece
customer_reviews.author: Nijax2020

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to put together but a nice looking table / chair set.
customer_reviews.author: david milliken

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, Tom a little bit of time and patience but so worth it. Great for a smaller space. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: You gotta love this dining set.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. It is good starter for a single person or couple just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: NAME_NOT_kelbyRETURNED

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a great price. My husband and I are very satisfied with the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Geydi

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! I was looking for affordable tall kitchen table. When it come it was easy to put together although it was time consuming. But worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Screw and bolts are easily striped! When assembling
customer_reviews.text: Screw and bolts are easily striped! When assembling, becareful and try not to screw them in too tight until the very end.
customer_reviews.author: Whatchamacallit?

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: This table is great. Looks classy, not to hard to assemble. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Land

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good Buy I agree it’s a little difficult to put together other than that great buy it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big hole
customer_reviews.text: There was a big hole on the table. That’s really annoying
customer_reviews.author: skyeak

customer_reviews.title: I really love this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I really love this coffee table. It's very beautiful and looks exactly like the picture. The only issue I had was the seat itself was hard to screw in. Some didn't have holes to screw in the screws so my husband had to make the holes. But other then that the table came out looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for our daughter and we're very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter and we're very happy with the quality. Very easy to put together and very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why is my table in Indiana???
customer_reviews.text: Don't know quality of table. It got delivered to Indiana. I'm in New Mexico. A completely different state.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Maestas

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied customer, product arrived damaged !!!
customer_reviews.text: Two of the wooden "seats" one chairs were damaged in shipping and they refuse to replace. Very bad customer service. The table scratches very easily, cheaply made. But then again, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a lovely table but they delivered it to Michigan. I live in Houston. That's 1326 miles away.
customer_reviews.author: Micaela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking set. Will buy again. After finally receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: This table is awesome. Too bad the seller delivered it to Virginia. I live in Texas.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Table and chair tops are sturdy wood and legs are metal. It took my husband a little while to put the chairs together but it was worth it in the end. I would suggest getting the little sticky pads for legs to protect your floors from scratching. You can’t beat the price for this. Worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Burgan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived packaged well. Time consuming, but not too hard to assemble. Very heavy. Under side of table appears damaged, but since it won’t be seen I’m not concerned. Seems very sturdy, but 2 stools wobble. Good for price!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

product_meta.title: Better Homes and Gardens Mercer Dining Set
product_meta.description: Mercer 5-piece counter height dining set, vintage oak. Includes square, counter-height dining table and 4 matching chairs .
feature_bullets: Includes square, counter-height dining table and 4 matching chairs
Sturdy metal table and chair frame construction
Warm brown wood tabletop, chair seat and back in mullti-step finish
Chair size : 18"w x 19.5"d x 40.25"h (45.72cm x 49.53cm x 102.24cm)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
